review.title: “NIce people”
review.pros: Pros – Owner of firm likeable and wants to do the right thing. Owner well liked in community. Employees are talented and good people.
review.cons: Cons – Leadership is a constant revolving door as owner seems to have serious trust issues. Reputation is seen as one who "over commits". A constant paranoia exists within the team which is evolving from the top - down.
review.advice-to-management: Advice to Senior Management – Owner needs to learn not to micro manage.

review.title: “Look Elsewhere”
review.pros: Pros – Team-Nice/good Team of people-talented20 years in BusinessWell liked CEO with strong ties
review.cons: Cons – Leadership:-Micro manage in areas where they have limited knowledge-lack of trust to allow personnel to make decisions within their role-Poor Vision/ direction-Inability to execute vision
review.advice-to-management: Advice to Senior Management – Hire visionary to get company back on track. Allow hired personnel to work within their expertise without micromanage. CEO should stay in limelight, serve as rainmaker but stay out of day to day duties.
